complaint_details: The frequent power outages in the society is a very annoying and reoccuring theme.
The issue of unstable voltage whether high or low is a troubling theme in the society. It causes a lot of damage to electrical appliances in the household.
The problem is mainly in high tariffs, the NEPA body simply increase the bills at will, although the supply of light is very weak. Thus making Prepaid Meter Type very popular.

The customer service we receive is extremely poor. Paraventure, the electrical wires of a transformer in our society gets stolen. There is little or no effort shown by NEPA when we complain and ask fo solutions/help.
The most dubios is illegal billing. An ex-NEPA officer could just come up to your house and request for the monthly bill or current working officers could over-price you.
